list.name: Nowya
list.description: Full-stack SaaS built from scratch. Design, backend and frontend by me.
list.details: Nowya is a fully-featured SaaS product for event-based notifications and user management. I designed and developed everything from database architecture to UI components.

list.name: VoluntRed
list.description: Platform connecting volunteers and NGOs. Built for social good.
list.details: I developed both the frontend and backend of this platform to help NGOs manage volunteers and campaigns. Focused on accessibility and speed.

list.name: EVA Protect
list.description: Firmware, DevOps and device streaming for a security system startup.
list.details: Led the embedded systems development and cloud infrastructure for a scalable, real-time camera monitoring solution using ESP32-CAM and AWS.

list.name: Fithub
list.description: Fitness tracking app in React Native, inspired by MyFitnessPal.
list.details: Developed a mobile app to track calories, workouts, and weight progress. Local storage with SQLite for offline support.
